hero.title: The Serenity of the Forest, The Spirit of the Hills.
hero.subtitle: Discover a hidden sanctuary where nature's rhythm restores your own.

image.alt: Purple gradient butterfly illustration representing serenity and nature

sections.title: The Forest
sections.description: Step out your door and into a world of green. The forests of Kaluwala are a living library of Himalayan flora and fauna.

image.alt: Abstract forest pattern in earth tones

sections.title: The Song River
sections.description: A short walk leads to the banks of the Song River, its clear waters flowing down from the mountains. It's the perfect spot for a quiet picnic, a moment of reflection, or simply to listen to the music of the water.

image.alt: Purple gradient representing flowing river waters

sections.title: Kalusidh Temple
sections.description: Discover the spiritual anchor of our village. The Kalusidh temple is not just a place of worship, but a beacon of peace and local legend that gives Kaluwala its name and its soul.

image.alt: Pixelated mosaic pattern representing the ancient temple

footer.title: Kaluwala
footer.description: A quiet corner of Uttarakhand where nature thrives.

seo.title: Kaluwala - A Hidden Sanctuary in Uttarakhand
seo.description: Discover the serenity of the forest and spirit of the hills at Kaluwala. A quiet corner of Uttarakhand where nature's rhythm restores your soul, featuring pristine forests, the Song River, and the ancient Kalusidh Temple.
